formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuration for the plugin
formElement.label: Configuration Name:

formElement.documentation:
Script to evaluate.
This is an example.

println "Compute raw client: $compute"
println "Project ID: $project"
println "Zone: $zone"
println "Flow Client: $ef"
println "Compute Wrapper: $wrapper"
formElement.label: Script:
formElement.value: println "Compute raw client: $compute" println "Project ID: $project" println "Zone: $zone" println "Flow Client: $ef" println "Compute Wrapper: $wrapper"
